name: part_007
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2024】Shirogane Noel Xmas 3D LIVE 【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [fTupWAFy6wo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'In My Dream' by Shirogane Noel, Tokino Sora, and Hoshimachi Suisei.

subtitles.original: ...としても上の空
subtitles.english: ...my mind is elsewhere.

subtitles.original: 分離したカフェオーレは
subtitles.english: The separated cafe au lait is...

subtitles.original: 二人の心みたいに 冷めてる
subtitles.english: ...cold, just like our hearts.

subtitles.original: 期待とは裏腹に 後退する気分
subtitles.english: Contrary to expectations, I feel like I'm retreating.

subtitles.original: 触発されたい 野性的に 官能的に
subtitles.english: I want to be inspired, wildly and sensually.

subtitles.original: In My Dream 空の彼方まで
subtitles.english: In My Dream, to the ends of the sky.

subtitles.original: エンジン全開で走りながら
subtitles.english: Running with the engine at full throttle.

subtitles.original: 永遠の愛を語ろう 朝まで
subtitles.english: Let's talk of eternal love until morning.

subtitles.original: I can't get enough your love
subtitles.english: I can't get enough of your love.

subtitles.original: In My Dream 飾らない涙で
subtitles.english: In My Dream, with unadorned tears.

subtitles.original: 悲しみさえも分かち合おう
subtitles.english: Let's share even our sadness.

subtitles.original: 何処にもないような素晴らしい real love
subtitles.english: A wonderful real love like nowhere else.

subtitles.original: 手に入れるまで I wanna sleep forever
subtitles.english: Until I have it, I want to sleep forever.

subtitles.original: In My Dream 赤い薔薇の花
subtitles.english: In My Dream, red roses.

subtitles.original: 部屋中にいっぱい敷きつめて
subtitles.english: Spread all over the room.

subtitles.original: シルクのベッドで愛し合おう 朝まで
subtitles.english: Let's make love on a silk bed until morning.

subtitles.original: I can't get enough your love
subtitles.english: I can't get enough of your love.

subtitles.original: In My Dream 目覚めさせないで
subtitles.english: In My Dream, don't wake me up.

subtitles.original: 邪魔はさせない誰にも
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get in the way.

subtitles.original: 耳元でいつもエンドレス・テープのように
subtitles.english: Always in my ear, like an endless tape...

subtitles.original: 囁いていて
subtitles.english: ...keep whispering.

subtitles.original: In My Dream 空の彼方まで
subtitles.english: In My Dream, to the ends of the sky.

subtitles.original: エンジン全開で走りながら
subtitles.english: Running with the engine at full throttle.

subtitles.original: 永遠の愛を語ろう 朝まで
subtitles.english: Let's talk of eternal love until morning.

subtitles.original: I can't get enough your love
subtitles.english: I can't get enough of your love.

subtitles.original: In My Dream 飾らない涙で
subtitles.english: In My Dream, with unadorned tears.

subtitles.original: 悲しみさえも分かち合おう
subtitles.english: Let's share even our sadness.

subtitles.original: 何処にもないような素晴らしい real love
subtitles.english: A wonderful real love like nowhere else.

subtitles.original: 手に入れるまで I wanna sleep forever
subtitles.english: Until I have it, I want to sleep forever.

subtitles.original: Starduster / 作詞・作曲：ジミーサムP
subtitles.english: Starduster / Lyrics & Composition: JimmyThumb-P

subtitles.original: 誰より大切な君に
subtitles.english: To you, who are more precious than anyone,

subtitles.original: 愛されないことを恐れて
subtitles.english: fearful of not being loved,

subtitles.original: 一万年先の星まで
subtitles.english: to a star ten thousand years away,

subtitles.original: ひとっ跳びで逃げた
subtitles.english: I fled in a single bound.

subtitles.original: そっと瞼を開けてみる
subtitles.english: I gently try to open my eyes.

subtitles.original: 目の前は黒い空の海
subtitles.english: Before me is the black sea of the sky.

subtitles.original: 一億年先の地平まで
subtitles.english: To the horizon a hundred million years away,

subtitles.original: 流れてゆくんだ
subtitles.english: it flows on.

subtitles.original: 吸い込んだ
subtitles.english: I inhaled...

subtitles.original: 真空の温度で
subtitles.english: ...the temperature of the vacuum.

subtitles.original: 感覚が 凍りつく前にもう
subtitles.english: Before my senses freeze over,

subtitles.original: この体の
subtitles.english: this body's...
